entry.title: Tengo unas ganas..
entry.content: Tengo unas ganas de agarra a mi maleta, el bulto, los motetes, el equipaje, mi valija, la mochila con todos los juguetes, y..darle la vuelta al mundo…

entry.title: Decide to be happy
entry.content: Decide to be happy, and the world will beat a path to your door.

entry.title: Some are better..
entry.content:
Some are better loved from a distance.

For a while, anyway.

And that’s OK.

Besides, love doesn’t really know the difference.

http://www.tut.com
entry.summary: Some are better loved from a distance. For a while, anyway. And that’s OK. Besides, love doesn’t really know the difference. http://www.tut.com

entry.title: had quite a few…
entry.content:
"I had quite a few pints and quite a few beers and quite a few glasses of red wine, and it all continued until about 30 minutes ago. Have to enjoy it when you can."

"I definitely appreciate an awful lot more what I’ve achieved now than what I did then. Ten years ago I did take an awful lot of things for granted […] I’m much more switched on to everything […]"

—http://www.usatoday.com/sports/golf/pga/2011-07-18-british-open_n.htm
entry.summary: "I had quite a few pints and quite a few beers and quite a few glasses of red wine, and it all continued until about 30 minutes ago. Have to enjoy it when you can." "I definitely appreciate an awful lot more what I’ve achieved now than what I did then. Ten years ago I did take an awful lot of things for granted […] I’m much more switched on to everything […]" —http://www.usatoday.com/sports/golf/pga/2011-07-18-british-open_n.htm

entry.title: Project Management truisms
entry.content:
The sooner you begin coding the later you finish.

A badly planned project will take three times longer than expected - a well-planned project only twice as long as expected.

There are no good project managers - only lucky ones.

Everyone asks for a strong project manager - when they get him they don’t want him.

Some projects finish on time in spite of project management best practices.

Fast - cheap - good: you can have any two.

The first 90% of a project takes 90% of the time the last 10% takes the other 90%.

If everything is going exactly to plan, something somewhere is going massively wrong.

—Falkayn’s Nest: Agile software, Ruby on Rails, ASP.NET, eLearning, technology, politics and marketing stuff
entry.summary: The sooner you begin coding the later you finish. A badly planned project will take three times longer than expected - a well-planned project only twice as long as expected. There are no good project managers - only lucky ones. Everyone asks for a strong project manager - when they get him they don’t want him. Some projects finish on time in spite of project management best practices. Fast - cheap - good: you can have any two. The first 90% of a project takes 90% of the time the last 10% takes the other 90%. If everything is going exactly to plan, something somewhere is going massively wrong. —Falkayn’s Nest: Agile software, Ruby on Rails, ASP.NET, eLearning, technology, politics and marketing stuff

entry.title: as kid after kid…
entry.content:
as kid after kid talked at me with that twinkle that you see in someone’s eye when confidence, skill, and passion come together in the right mix.

—Maker Faire RI rocked
